description:
``pip`` is a great tool, but dependency management doesn't stop there.
I'll explore several tools that work with ``pip`` to make managing your
dependencies easier, faster, and safer. I'll cover generating
dependencies a better way, maintaining your ``requirements.txt`` for the
long-term, and exploring existing Python environments. Afterward, you'll
never want to ``pip freeze > requirements.txt`` again.
title: What's in your pip toolbox?
